'''Bedrock Editor v1.0.3''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released on June 25, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/249|title=Release 1.0.3 (1.21.100.22)|website=GitHub|date=June 25, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/37552064279565-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-100-22|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.100.22|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 25, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added an optional image field to tooltips for modal tools and property pane components.
* Added "Mute Music" and "Mute Game Sounds" toggles to Editor settings pane.
* Added the ability to drag a structure item from the Structure panel to the viewport. This updates the clipboard and activates the paste preview.

== Changes ==
* Updated the {{cmd|structure}} command in an Editor Project to use the Editor Structure repository instead of the level's.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed misaligned icons and image artifacts for block imaged after entering and returning from a test world.
